languages.text: Мятеж был беспощадно подавлен объединенными силами хранивших верность Кассии Навигаторов и блюстителей фон Валанциус. Но цена даже провалившегося восстания была слишком велика для Дома Орселлио, разом утратившего половину влияния и превратившемуся в придворный навигаторский Дом при Вольном Торговце.

The mutiny was mercilessly suppressed by the united forces of Navigators loyal to Cassia and von Valancius enforcers. But the price of even a failed rebellion was too high for House Orsellio, which lost half of its influence overnight and thereafter operated entirely under the aegis of the Rogue Trader, a Navigator House in name only.
languages.original_text: Мятеж был беспощадно подавлен объединенными силами хранивших верность Кассии Навигаторов и блюстителей фон Валанциус. Но цена даже провалившегося восстания была слишком велика для Дома Орселлио, разом утратившего половину влияния и превратившемуся в придворный навигаторский Дом при Вольном Торговце.

traits.locale_text: The mutiny was suppressed with the united force of Navigators loyal to Cassia, and the von Valancius enforcers. But the price of even a failed rebellion was too high for House Orsellio, which lost half of its influence overnight and became a court Navigator House for the Rogue Trader.

The mutiny was suppressed with the united force of Navigators loyal to Cassia, and the von Valancius enforcers. But the price of even a failed rebellion was too high for House Orsellio, which lost half of its influence overnight and became a court Navigator House for the Rogue Trader.

The mutiny was mercilessly suppressed by the united forces of the Navigators loyal to Cassia and the von Valancius enforcers. But the price of even a failed rebellion was too high for House Orsellio, which lost half of its influence overnight and became a court navigator house for the Rogue Trader.

The mutiny was mercilessly suppressed by the united forces of the Navigators loyal to Cassia and the von Valancius enforcers. But the price of even a failed rebellion was too high for House Orsellio, which lost half of its influence overnight and became a court navigator house for the Rogue Trader.

The mutiny was mercilessly suppressed by the united forces of Navigators loyal to Cassia and von Valancius enforcers. But the price of even a failed rebellion was too high for House Orsellio, which lost half of its influence overnight and thereafter operated entirely under the aegis of the Rogue Trader, a Navigator House in name only.

The mutiny was mercilessly suppressed by the united forces of Navigators loyal to Cassia and von Valancius enforcers. But the price of even a failed rebellion was too high for House Orsellio, which lost half of its influence overnight and thereafter operated entirely under the aegis of the Rogue Trader, a Navigator House in name only.

languages.text: 忠于卡西娅的导航者与冯·瓦兰修斯的执法者联合起来，无情地镇压了这场叛乱。但是，即使是这样一场失败的叛乱，也对奥赛罗家族造成了沉重的打击。它在一夜之间失去了一半的影响力，最终彻底沦为行商浪人的附庸，名存实亡。
languages.original_text: The mutiny was mercilessly suppressed by the united forces of Navigators loyal to Cassia and von Valancius enforcers. But the price of even a failed rebellion was too high for House Orsellio, which lost half of its influence overnight and thereafter operated entirely under the aegis of the Rogue Trader, a Navigator House in name only.

traits.locale_text: 忠于卡西娅的导航者与冯·瓦兰修斯的执法者联合起来，无情地镇压了这场叛乱。但是，即使是这样一场失败的叛乱，也对奥塞罗家族造成了沉重的打击。它在一夜之间失去了一半的影响力，最终成为行商浪人的御用导航者家族。

languages.text: Cassias treue Navigatoren und die Enforcer der Dynastie derer von Valancius schlugen die Meuterei gemeinsam gnadenlos nieder. Doch selbst der Preis für eine gescheiterte Rebellion war für das Haus Orsellio zu hoch, das über Nacht die Hälfte seines Einflusses verlor und fortan unter der Ägide {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} diente. Ein Navigatorenhaus waren sie nun allein dem Namen nach.
languages.original_text: The mutiny was mercilessly suppressed by the united forces of Navigators loyal to Cassia and von Valancius enforcers. But the price of even a failed rebellion was too high for House Orsellio, which lost half of its influence overnight and thereafter operated entirely under the aegis of the Rogue Trader, a Navigator House in name only.

traits.locale_text: Cassias treue Navigatoren und die Enforcers der Dynastie von Valancius schlugen die Meuterei gemeinsam gnadenlos nieder. Doch auch der Preis für eine gescheiterte Rebellion war für das Haus Orsellio zu hoch, das über Nacht die Hälfte seines Einflusses verlor und zum Navigatorenhaus am Hof {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wurde.

languages.text: La mutinerie fut impitoyablement réprimée par les forces unies des navigateurs fidèles à Cassia et des prévôts des von Valancius. Malgré cela, cette tentative de rébellion coûta très cher à la maison Orsellio, qui perdit la moitié de son influence du jour au lendemain. Totalement soumise à l'autorité {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, elle n'avait plus d'une maison de navigateurs que le nom.
languages.original_text: The mutiny was mercilessly suppressed by the united forces of Navigators loyal to Cassia and von Valancius enforcers. But the price of even a failed rebellion was too high for House Orsellio, which lost half of its influence overnight and thereafter operated entirely under the aegis of the Rogue Trader, a Navigator House in name only.

traits.locale_text: La mutinerie fut impitoyablement réprimée par les forces unies des navigateurs fidèles à Cassia et des prévôts des von Valancius. Malgré cela, cette tentative de rébellion coûta très cher à la maison Orsellio, qui perdit la moitié de son influence du jour au lendemain. Totalement soumise à l'autorité {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, elle n'avait plus d'une maison de navigateurs que le nom.

languages.text: Las fuerzas unidas de los Navegantes leales a Cassia y los agentes de von Valancius acabaron con el motín de forma despiadada, pero el precio de la rebelión, por fallida que fuera, fue demasiado alto para la casa Orsellio, que perdió la mitad de su influencia al momento y empezó a operar enteramente bajo la tutela de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, pasando a ser una casa de navegantes solo de nombre.
languages.original_text: The mutiny was mercilessly suppressed by the united forces of Navigators loyal to Cassia and von Valancius enforcers. But the price of even a failed rebellion was too high for House Orsellio, which lost half of its influence overnight and thereafter operated entirely under the aegis of the Rogue Trader, a Navigator House in name only.

traits.locale_text: Las fuerzas unidas de los Navegantes leales a Cassia y los agentes de von Valancius acabaron con el motín de forma despiadada, pero el precio de la rebelión, por fallida que fuera, fue demasiado alto para la casa Orsellio, que perdió la mitad de su influencia al momento y acabó convirtiéndose en parte de la corte de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: 反乱は、カシアに忠誠を誓う航宙士たちとフォン・ヴァランシウスのエンフォーサーの連合軍によって容赦なく鎮圧された。しかし、失敗したとはいえ反乱の代償は、オーセリオ家にとってあまりにも大きすぎた。オーセリオ家は一夜にして影響力の大半を失った。そしてその後、名ばかりの航宙士の家となり、自由開拓者の庇護のもとに存続している。
languages.original_text: The mutiny was mercilessly suppressed by the united forces of Navigators loyal to Cassia and von Valancius enforcers. But the price of even a failed rebellion was too high for House Orsellio, which lost half of its influence overnight and thereafter operated entirely under the aegis of the Rogue Trader, a Navigator House in name only.

traits.locale_text: 反乱は、カシアに忠誠を誓う航宙士たちとフォン・ヴァランシウスのエンフォーサーの連合軍によって容赦なく鎮圧された。しかし、失敗したとはいえ反乱の代償は、オーセリオ家にとってあまりにも大きすぎた。オーセリオ家は一夜にして影響力の大半を失った。そしてその後、名ばかりの航宙士の家となり、自由開拓者の庇護のもとに存続している。

languages.text: İsyan, Cassia'ya sadık Rotacıların ve von Valancius infazcılarının bir araya getirdiği kuvvetler tarafından acımasızca bastırıldı. Ancak bu başarısız isyan bile Orsellio Hanesi'ne pahalıya mal oldu. Bir gecede nüfuzunun yarısını kaybeden Hane, sonraki dönemde yalnızca Hür Tacir'in koruması sayesinde faaliyetlerini sürdürdü. Rotacı Hanesi'nin ismi vardı cismi yoktu.
languages.original_text: The mutiny was mercilessly suppressed by the united forces of Navigators loyal to Cassia and von Valancius enforcers. But the price of even a failed rebellion was too high for House Orsellio, which lost half of its influence overnight and thereafter operated entirely under the aegis of the Rogue Trader, a Navigator House in name only.

traits.locale_text: İsyan, Cassia'ya sadık Rotacıların ve von Valancius infazcılarının bir araya getirdiği kuvvetler tarafından acımasızca bastırıldı ancak bu başarısız olmuş isyan bile Orsellio Hanesi'ne pahalıya mâl oldu. Bir gecede nüfuzunun yarısını kaybetti ve sonraki dönemde yalnızca Hür Tacir'in koruması altında olması sayesinde faaliyet gösterebildi. Rotacı Hanesi ismi vardı cismi yoktu.
